ExploreFact.Text: A Nomai named Adonsonia created a puzzle involving detecting signals. She locked a requirement for a project behind solving it.
Simultaneously scanning all the astral bodies' signals activated a nearby Nomai computer.
A warp transmitter on the equator of Shattered Geode. A Nomai named Daucus modified it to link with both receivers on the other planets in the system.

A quantum rock located in a structure facing the sun on Shattered Geode. There is a large skylight in the ceiling. A Nomai named Betula theorized about where the stone might go when it disappears. The stone took a recorder with it when it disappeared.
By blocking the light from the sun, I was able to quantum entangle with the rock to reach a cave below the surface.
